    • notifyUsers

      public static void notifyUsers​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​User> connectedPlayers, Message message)

    • addPlayer

      public static boolean addPlayer​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​User> players, java.lang.String nick, User user)
      Adds an active player to a map of players players
      Returns:
      true if the player is successfully added, false if it fails if there's another player connected
      with his name.

    • isNamePresent

      public static <T> boolean isNamePresent​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​T> connectedPlayers, java.lang.String nick)
      Returns:
      true if nick is present

    • removePlayer

      public static boolean removePlayer​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​User> connectedPlayers, java.lang.String nick) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Removes a player from the list of connected players
      Returns:
      true if the player is present and is successfully removed, false if a Player is not present
      and can't be removed.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException
